conversation.message: We are extremely excited about the educational philosophy and community at Nursery_C. You are our clear first choice. We formally submit our application now and hope to secure a place in your program.

However, analyzing the preferences of Parent_C and Parent_B:

*   Parent_B (P2 for N_C) ranks N_C 5th (last), preferring N_B (1st) and N_D (2nd).

It is highly probable that both Parent_C and Parent_B will apply to their higher ranked choices (N_D or N_B) in Round 1. This leaves an opening for Parent_D to secure their top choice, Nursery_C, despite being 3rd priority. I will apply immediately to maximize my chance at my top preference.
